About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Hello! My name is James Quinn and I am a software developer. I enjoy many hobbies including music production and live audio using software such as Protools. I also enjoy working on our family hay farm in Norton Ohio. Please read bellow for information about my previous work experience.

BWXT

QA Inspector

While working in Quality Assurance at BWXT, I Performed inspections according to approved procedures on critical nuclear components, Accurately documented inspection findings, and Facilitated communication between engineering department and management

The J.M. Smucker Company

software developer

During my senior year of college I had the opportunity to intern at the J.M. Smucker Company as a software developer. My key responsibilities included working with the team on defect resolution in existing applications, creating interactive data visualization dashboards using BI tools such as SSRS and Spotfire, and also created SQL stored procedures.

Quinn Farm

Tractorist

Working at Quinn Farm I am resposible for the process of turning green, perishable forage into a product that can be safely stored and easily transported without danger of spoilage, while keeping nutrient loss to a minimum.
